questions.instructions: What's the advantage of fighting a Banshee on a ramp?

choices.label: Banshee feet have no grip so she can't climb it
If you are higher or lower than her, she can't hit you with her ranged attack
If you are higher or lower than her, she can't sync-kill you
Banshees can go up ramps but not down

questions.explanation: Enemies with the ability to sync-kill can only lock on to targets that are at the same altitude.

questions.instructions: What happens if you put a Heavy Barrel mod on a Carnifex?

choices.label: It adds the extra weight but does not increase damage
It increases damage but does not add the extra weight
It increases damage and adds the extra weight

questions.explanation: The mods that add extra weight only do so on DLC weapons, so on non-DLC weapons like the Carnifex you can get the extra bonuses on these mods "for free".

questions.instructions: Which of these is the most optimal way to reload-cancel?

choices.label: Attempting to use medigel when not downed

questions.explanation: The other methods listed might be better in certain situations but they all take time to perform, while pushing the medigel button when not downed immediately cancels the reload animation.
